name: Parallax-IDE
description: Parallax microcontroller development environment based on Chrome applications.

packageJSON.name: parallax-ide
packageJSON.description: Write, compile, and download code to your Parallax Boe-Bot Robot or custom BASIC Stamp microcontroller-based electronic creations.

releases.body:
**Important**
- Requires Chrome v45+.
- On Chromebooks, early versions of Chrome OS v54 cause system freezes when USB devices are plugged in.  ParallaxIDE requires Chrome OS v54.0.2840.101 or later to fix this problem.

**Updated**
- [Enchanced: Supports both mouse and touch on touchscreen devices](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/322)
- [Fixed: Tx activity light does not blink on transmission](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/310)
- [Fixed: When prompted with overwrite dialog, user loses "Don't Save" option upon "Cancel"](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/276)

**Known Issues**
- [Unable to download after certain previous downloads on Windows](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/194) - NOTE: Place `PAUSE 200` at start of PBASIC code to prevent this.  Use RecoverBS2.exe (in Downloads below) to recover BS2-IC modules from this condition.
- [Debug Terminal: Receive Pane Scrolls Awkwardly](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/202)
- [Download progress invisible in Ubuntu (or Chromium?)](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/226)
- [When prompted with overwrite dialog, user loses "Don't Save" option upon "Cancel"](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/276)

**Important**
- Requires Chrome v45+.

**Updated**
- [Enhanced: Example PBASIC source code now included](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/133)
- [Enhanced: Added Echo Off control on Debug Terminal](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/185)
- [Enhanced: Automatic (event-driven) USB port arrival/departure handling](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/79)
- [Fixed: Open/Create Project prompt's scrollbar ignores mouse](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/277)
- [Fixed: Project/File View scrollbar ignores mouse click](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/290)

**Known Issues**
- [Unable to download after certain previous downloads on Windows](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/194) - NOTE: Place `PAUSE 200` at start of PBASIC code to prevent this.  Use RecoverBS2.exe (in Downloads below) to recover BS2-IC modules from this condition.
- [Debug Terminal: Receive Pane Scrolls Awkwardly](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/202)
- [Download progress invisible in Ubuntu (or Chromium?)](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/226)
- [When prompted with overwrite dialog, user loses "Don't Save" option upon "Cancel"](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/276)

**Important**
- Requires Chrome v45+.

**Updated**
- [Fixed: Delete Project prompt does not disappear after clicking Yes button](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/278)
- [Fixed: Open/Create Project prompt's scrollbar ignores mouse](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/277)
- [Fixed: Project/File View scrollbar ignores mouse click](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/290)
- [Added beginning support for BS2e, BS2sx, BS2p24, BS2p40, and BS2pe](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/291)
- [Enhanced Debug Terminal's TX/RX indicator's activity visibility](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/213)
- [Added Debug Terminal Echo Off control](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/185)
- [Added Debug Terminal automatic port arrival/departure handling](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/79)

**Known Issues**
- [Unable to download after certain previous downloads](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/194)
- [Debug Terminal: Receive Pane Scrolls Awkwardly](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/202)
- [Download progress invisible in Ubuntu (or Chromium?)](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/226)
- [When prompted with overwrite dialog, user loses "Don't Save" option upon "Cancel"](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/276)

**Important**
- Requires Chrome v45+.

**Updated**
- [Improvement: Made significant progress in issue - Unable to download after certain previous downloads](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/194)
- [Fixed: Debug Terminal's CLRDN (12) didn't clear the line the cursor is on](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/269)
- [Fixed: Save file overlay was missing "Don't Save" option for New Operation](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/268)
- [Enhanced: Save As Overlay now puts cursor to right of current file name](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/204)
- [Added: Debug Terminal now automatically removes echos](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/184)
- [Enhanced: Researched serial BREAK condition fix and updated to use new Chrome Serial API (v45)](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/144)
- [Dev: Simplified versioning through npm lifecycles](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/271)

**Known Issues**
- [Unable to download after certain previous downloads](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/194)
- [Debug Terminal: Receive Pane Scrolls Awkwardly](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/202)
- [Download progress invisible in Ubuntu (or Chromium?)](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/226)
- [Delete Project prompt does not disappear after clicking Yes button](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/278)
- [Open/Create Project prompt's scrollbar ignores mouse](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/277)
- [When prompted with overwrite dialog, user loses "Don't Save" option upon "Cancel"](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/276)

**Updated**
- Same as [v0.8.0](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/releases/tag/v0.8.0) except package description updated.

**Known Issues**
- Same as [v0.8.0](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/releases/tag/v0.8.0).

**Updated**
- [Fixed: User configuration still not always saved](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/248)
- [Fixed: Debug Terminal's Clear Down function accidentally scrolls the display](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/212)
- [Fixed: "Don't Save" button appears at undesired time](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/247)
- [Fixed: New blank file state doesn't override last unsaved file](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/249)
- [Added Save As Overwrite prompt](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/168)
- [Enhanced to place default directives in new files](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/253)
- [Enhanced so port status scroll bars do not interfere with display of text in Windows platforms](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/250)
- [Added Help link (F1)](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/252)
- [Added a "New Version" notice that appears on first run after install](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/215)
- [Enhanced Receive Buffer to process data and display more efficiently](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/202)
- [Enhanced Receive Buffer to hold 10k lines](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/199)
- [Updated short description for Education](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/256)

**Known Issues**
- [Unable to download after certain previous downloads](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/194)
- [Debug Terminal: Receive Pane Scrolls Awkwardly](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/202)
- [Download progress invisible in Ubuntu (or Chromium?)](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/226)
- [Debug Terminal: CLRDN (12) doesn't clear the line the cursor is on](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/269)

**Updated**
- [Fixed: Creating a new file while a new unsaved file is visible doesn't prompt to save](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/230)
- [Fixed: Temporary file creation and storage failure](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/235)
- [Fixed: Broken file storage and start of session recovery](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/236)
- [Fixed: Temporary source reopens only every other session](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/234)
- [Fixed: New unsaved file lost between sessions](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/208)
- [Fixed: Automatic Save prompt fails for new files after new session](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/207)
- [Fixed: User configuration changes sometimes don't save](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/231)
- [Fixed: Debug Terminal lines limited to less than 256 characters](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/203)
- [Fixed: Debug Terminal LF, CR processing filters out intended duplicates](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/211)
- [Fixed: Debug Terminal Receive Pane doesn't scroll on word wrap](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/200)
- [Fixed: Debug Terminal erroneously inserts (instead of overwrites) text](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/201)
- [Fixed: Download function enumerates ports before tokenization](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/233)
- [Enhanced to indicate status of ports during identification/download](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/196)

**Known Issues**
- [Unable to download after certain previous downloads](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/194)
- [User configuration still not always saved](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/248)
- [Port status scroll bars interfere with display of text](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/250)
- [Debug Terminal: Receive Pane Scrolls Awkwardly](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/202)
- ["Don't Save" button appears at undesired time](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/247)
- [Download progress invisible in Ubuntu (or Chromium?)](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/226)
- [Debug Terminal's Clear Down function accidentally scrolls the display](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/212)

_[not recommended for use]_

**Updates**
- [Many structural improvements for future maintenance](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues?q=milestone%3A%22Sprint+8%22)
- [Enhanced prompt and response for unexpected module types selected](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/225)
- [Now properly closes port after failure to Identify](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/195)
- [Fixed phantom new file and Save As prompt after deleting a file](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/209)
- [Repaired automatic Save As prompt after new session with unsaved file](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/206)
- [Enhanced to focus editor after a New File operation](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/205)
- [Fixed errant source indicator after save](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/182)
- [Fixed next session open error after changing project and closing app](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/232)
- [Fixed typo in Delete File prompt](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/214)
- [Updated the short description for the Chrome Web Store](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/216)

**Known Issues**
- [Unable to download after certain previous downloads](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/194)
- [Creating a new file while a new unsaved file is visible doesn't prompt to save](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/230)
- [Temporary file creation and storage failure](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/235)
- [Broken file storage and start of session recovery](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/236)
- [Temporary source reopens only every other session](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/234)
- [New unsaved file lost between sessions](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/208)
- [Automatic Save prompt fails for new files after new session](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/207)
- [User configuration changes sometimes don't save](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/231)
- [Debug Terminal: Lines limited to less than 256 characters](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/203)
- [Debug Terminal: LF, CR processing filters out intended duplicates](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/211)
- [Debug Terminal: Receive Pane doesn't scroll on word wrap](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/200)
- [Debug Terminal: Erroneously inserts (instead of overwrites) text](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/201)
- [Debug Terminal: Receive Pane Scrolls Awkwardly](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/202)
- [Debug Terminal's Clear Down function accidentally scrolls the display](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/212)
- [Download progress invisible in Ubuntu (or Chromium?)](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/226)
- [Download function enumerates ports before tokenization](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/233)
- [Source status indicator sometimes incorrectly reports modified state](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/182)

**Updates**
- [Enhanced to include Transmit Pane in Debug Terminal](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/76)
- [Improved Debug Terminal performance](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/178)
- [Handles downloads where specified module type not present but alternate module available](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/166)
- [Fixed print to remove menu from first page](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/181)

**Known Issues**
- [Identify/Download fails to recognize BASIC Stamp after certain downloads](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/194)
- [Holds port open after failure to identify](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/195)
- [Receive Pane doesn't scroll upon word wrap](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/200)
- [Source status indicator sometimes incorrectly reports modified state](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/182)
- [Debug Terminal doesn't always operate in overwrite mode](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/201)
- [Debug Terminal Receive Pane scrolls awkwardly](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/202)
- [New unsaved file lost between sessions](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/208)
- [Automatic save prompt fails for new files after session](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/207)
- [Automatic Save As fails after new session](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/206)
- [Deleting file causes phantom new file and Save As dialog](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/209)
- [Debug Terminal filters out extra line breaks](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/211)
- [Debug Terminal's Clear Down function accidentally scrolls the display](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/212)

**Updates**
- [Prevents Undo/Redo buffer from spans across files](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/69)
- [Adds Save As function and Ctrl+Shift+S shortcut key](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/108)
- [Tab key now indents selected block](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/120)
- [Shift-Tab now outdents selected block](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/121)
- [Adds Ctrl-F4 key combination to start replace operation](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/123)
- [Fixes print of current source code](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/127)
- [Updates Identify feature and adds Ctrl+I, F6, and Search+6 (Chromebook) shortcut keys](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/128)
- [Adds Syntax Check feature and Ctrl+T and F7, and Search+7 (Chromebook) shortcut key](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/129)
- [Create F9 and Ctrl-R keyboard shortcuts to tokenize and download](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/131)
- [Updates Tokenizer function to highlight and view offending source](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/132)
- [Automatically determines target stamp after port scanning during download operation](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/139)
- [Automatic download now handles "No Modules Found"](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/163)
- [Automatic download now handles single instance of module type found](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/164)
- [Automatic download now handles multiple instances of same module type found](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/165)

**Known Issues**
- [Identify / Download function fails to find BASIC Stamp after some event](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/177)
- [Debug Terminal processing of large data causes application to become unresponsive](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/178)
- [Tab / Shift+Tab indents line instead of inserting white space at in-line cursor position](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/174)
- [Source status indicator sometimes incorrectly reports modified source state](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/182)

**Updates**
- [Name changed from "Chrome IDE" to "Parallax IDE"](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/151)
- [Debug Terminal: adds initial support for all defined control characters](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/75)
- [Debug Terminal: adds Tx/Rx Indicators](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/78)
- [Adds initial Sync File System support](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/84)
- [Preprocesses source of Unicode characters before tokenizing](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/94)
- [File dialog sets focus on filename field automatically](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/106)
- [Adds new source function](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/107)
- [Adjusts syntax highlighting](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/109)
- [Adds found match animation](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/110)
- [Fixes line number collision with vertical separator line](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/111)
- [Fixes one source of intermittent BASIC Stamp not found errors](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/114)
- [Applies flux architecture patterns to remove state from views](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/115)
- [Filters out all 'cu' communication ports](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/116)
- [Firmware revision column now appears in the device information in the Identify/Download dialog](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/117)
- [Enumerates and scan ports upon opening Identify/Download dialog](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/118)
- [Renames Identify/Download dialog's "Reload Device" to "Refresh"](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/119)

**Known Issues**
- [Undo/Redo Buffer Spans Across Files](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/69)

**Updates**
- Passes all 1300+ PBASIC code tokenizer tests
- Handles fast data processing in Debug Terminal more smoothly
- Supports BASIC Stamp Identification
- Adds port scanning on identify and download processes
- Displays progress indicator during port scanning
- Adds a determinate progress bar for downloaded packets
- Saves user session state on application close
- Restores user session on application startup
- Highlights PBASIC syntax properly
- Includes keyboard shortcuts
  - Ctrl-A - Select all text in current source code
  - Ctrl-C - Copy selected text to the clipboard
  - Ctrl-F - Find text
  - F3 or Ctrl-G - Find text again
  - Shift+F3 or Ctrl-Shift-G - Find text again (opposite direction)
  - Ctrl-V - Paste text from clipboard to selected area
  - Ctrl-X - Cut selected text to the clipboard
  - Ctrl-Z - Undo last action
  - Ctrl-Shift-Z - Redo last action
  - Ctrl-Up - Move source view up one line without moving cursor
  - Ctrl-Down - Move source view down one line without moving cursor
  - Ctrl-O - Open (or create) project
  - Ctrl-S - Save current source code to its current location on disk
  - Ctrl-P - Print current source
  - Ctrl-Tab - Switch to next source in project
  - Ctrl-Shift-Tab - Switch to previous source in project
  - ESC - Close current dialog
  - Ctrl-Home or Cmd-Up (Mac) or Ctrl+Search+Left (Chromebook) - Jump to top of file
  - Ctrl-End or Cmd-Down (Mac) or Ctrl+Search+Right (Chromebook) - Jump to end of file
  - Tab - Indent block - inserts space characters (single-line only)
  - Shift-Tab - Outdent block (deletes space characters)

**Known Issues**
- [Undo/Redo Buffer Spans Across Files](https://github.com/parallaxinc/ChromeIDE/issues/69)

**Updates**
- Fixed PBASIC Tokenizer failures preventing source greater than 255 characters in length.

**Known Issues**
- [Fast data causes performance degradation and apparent lock-up](https://github.com/parallaxinc/ChromeIDE/issues/66)
- [Undo/Redo Buffer Spans Across Files](https://github.com/parallaxinc/ChromeIDE/issues/69)

**Updates**
- Added communication over serial and UI display when using `DEBUG` statements in PBASIC code.
- Added toasts that supply success and error messages for some user actions, like compilation and file operations.
- Added support for temporary files (making edits and not saving) that persist across application restarts.

**Known Issues**
- [Fails to compile source greater than 256 characters in length](https://github.com/parallaxinc/Parallax-IDE/issues/67)

Parallax microcontroller development environment based on Chrome application technologies.

## Quickstart Installation
1. Download the latest release [here](https://github.com/parallaxinc/ChromeIDE/releases/download/v0.1.0/chromeide.zip). Or click the 'chromeide.zip' link below.
2. Go to your downloads folder and unzip the archive.
   
   __Note:_ for use on Chromebook you will need to unzip the archive and copy the unzipped directory onto the Chromebook._
3. Open your Chrome browser and navigate to
   
   `chrome://extensions`
4. Enable 'Developer Mode' by clicking the checkbox.
   
   ![enable developer mode](readme-images/enable-developer-mode.png)
5. Click on **'Load unpacked extensions...'**, go to the directory where ChromeIDE was unzipped, highlight the _'ChromeIDE'_ folder and and click select.
   
   ![load extension](readme-images/load-unpacked-extensions.png)
   ![select folder](readme-images/select-extension-folder.png)
6. Return to the `chrome://extensions` page and you should see **'Parallax Chrome IDE'** listed in available extensions.
   
   ![chromeIDE listed](readme-images/chromeIDE-listed.png)
7. Ensure the checkbox is _'enabled'_ and click **'launch'**.
8. **Congratulations!** You just launched ChromeIDE which will look something like this:
   
   ![app launched](readme-images/chromeIDE-launched.png)
